recipes.title: Pork Chop
recipes.ingredients:
2 pork chops.
Olive oil.
Salt.
Pepper.
recipes.instructions:
Pan fry pork chop with olive oil for 15 mins.
Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.title: Boiled Chicken
recipes.instructions:
Place chicken in boiling water.
Simmer for 30 mins with salt.

recipes.title: Smoke Duck
recipes.ingredients:
1 Duck
1 TBSP Honey
1 TBSP Molasses
2 TBSP Orange Juice
1 TBSP Balsamic Vinegar
Zest of one orange
Pinch of salt and pepper
recipes.instructions:
Combine ingredients and brush it on the duck. 
Smoke duck to an internal temp of 165 in the breast and 175 in the thigh.
Allow it to rest for 15 â€“ 20 minutes.
